synopsis.text: Summoned through a mysterious letter, the introverted Miu Takigawa finds herself in an unfamiliar, top-secret facility alongside seven equally bewildered girls. As they struggle to comprehend their circumstances, a major record label unveils an audacious plan: the formation of an unprecedented idol group with these very girls as its members. With the world of entertainment poised for a revolution, the girls must rise to the challenge and embrace their new identities as the extraordinary idol group, 22/7.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
